# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# REQUIRED SETTINGS - Get these from the session generator
# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
OWNER_NUMBER=08136800956

# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
# BWM-XMD BOT CONFIGURATION
# All settings can be controlled via these environment variables
# They work together with database settings - env vars take priority
# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# BOT SETTINGS
# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
BOT_NAME=BWM XMD
PREFIX=.
MODE=public
PACKNAME=BWM-XMD
TIMEZONE=Africa/Nairobi
AUTHOR=Ibrahimadams

# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# ANTI-CALL SETTINGS
# ANTI_CALL: on/off - Enable or disable anti-call
# ANTI_CALL_ACTION: reject/block - What to do when call detected
# ANTI_CALL_MSG: Message to send when rejecting call
# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
ANTI_CALL=on
ANTI_CALL_ACTION=reject
ANTI_CALL_MSG=Call me later

# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# ANTI-DELETE SETTINGS
# ANTI_DELETE: on/off - Enable anti-delete feature
# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
ANTI_DELETE=on

# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# ANTI-LINK SETTINGS
# ANTI_LINK: off/warn/delete/remove
# WARN_LIMIT: Number of warnings before action (default: 3)
# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
ANTI_LINK=off
WARN_LIMIT=3

# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# ANTI-TAG/STATUS MENTION SETTINGS
# ANTI_TAG: off/warn/delete/remove
# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
ANTI_TAG=off

# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# AUTO-READ SETTINGS
# AUTO_READ: on/off - Automatically read incoming messages
# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
AUTO_READ=off

# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# AUTO-BIO SETTINGS
# AUTO_BIO: on/off - Enable auto bio update
# AUTO_BIO_MSG: Message to display as bio
# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
AUTO_BIO=on
AUTO_BIO_MSG=BWM-XMD Always active!

# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# AUTO STATUS SETTINGS
# AUTO_STATUS_VIEW: on/off - Auto-view status updates
# AUTO_STATUS_LIKE: on/off - Auto-like status updates
# AUTO_STATUS_REPLY: on/off - Auto-reply to status updates
# STATUS_REPLY_MSG: Message to send when auto-replying to status
# STATUS_LIKE_EMOJIS: Comma-separated emojis for liking status
# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
AUTO_STATUS_VIEW=on
AUTO_STATUS_LIKE=off
AUTO_STATUS_REPLY=off
STATUS_REPLY_MSG=Nice status! Viewed by BWM-XMD Bot
STATUS_LIKE_EMOJIS=❤️,💜,💙,🤍,💛

# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# CHATBOT SETTINGS
# CHATBOT: on/off - Enable AI chatbot
# CHATBOT_MODE: private/group/both - Where chatbot responds
# CHATBOT_TRIGGER: Trigger word for chatbot (default: dm)
# CHATBOT_RESPONSE: text/audio - Default response type
# CHATBOT_VOICE: Voice for audio responses (Kimberly, Salli, etc)
# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
CHATBOT=off
CHATBOT_MODE=private
CHATBOT_TRIGGER=dm
CHATBOT_RESPONSE=text
CHATBOT_VOICE=Kimberly

# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# PRESENCE SETTINGS
# PRESENCE_PRIVATE: off/online/typing/recording - Presence in DMs
# PRESENCE_GROUP: off/online/typing/recording - Presence in groups
# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
PRESENCE_PRIVATE=typing
PRESENCE_GROUP=off

# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# MENU STYLING
# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
BOT_URL=https://on.bwmxmd.co.ke/veksnu.jpg,https://on.bwmxmd.co.ke/ge01u0.jpg,https://on.bwmxmd.co.ke/ztb02d.jpg
MENU_TOP_LEFT=*┌─❖*
MENU_BOT_NAME_LINE=*│
MENU_BOTTOM_LEFT=*└┬❖*
MENU_GREETING_LINE=   *│
MENU_DIVIDER=   *└────────┈❖*
MENU_USER_LINE=> 🕵️
MENU_DATE_LINE=> 📅
MENU_TIME_LINE=> ⏰
MENU_STATS_LINE=> ⭐
MENU_BOTTOM_DIVIDER=▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# DATABASE (optional - uses SQLite if not set)
# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# DATABASE_URL=postgres://user:password@host:port/database
